title: The Industry Plant
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we discuss nepotism, greed, who and what an "industry plant" is and the overall state of the music industry. 

Wellness Segment:

In honor of #NationalLibraryWeek check out the Libby App https://libbyapp.com/welcome for free e-books and audiobooks.

Black Business of the Week:

The Crush Global travel company is hosting a getaway to Havana, Cuba - June 13th-17th. For more information visit https://www.crushglobaltravel.com/havana-getaway

Thank you to our Sponsors:

April 15th is right around the corner! Get your taxes done with H&R Block. Schedule an appointment today at https://www.hrblock.com

Deliciously simple recipes with fresh pre-measured ingredients delivered right to your door. For $80 off your first month of HelloFresh, go to HelloFresh.com/friendzone80 and enter code FRIENDZONE80

100% organic tampons with LOLA. For 40% off all subscriptions, visit https://www.mylola.com and enter FRIENDZONE when you subscribe.

A better way to get birth control is here. Get the $20 prescription fee waived by going to simplehealth.com/FRIENDZONE or entering code FRIENDZONE at checkout.

Follow us online:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a dope day!
